column5: Hi,  Does any one have any insight for fishing for brookies in the Halton area. Any information would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.
Welcome to the board.  Let us know how you make out!
Nicely played Doug!  And yes, welcome aboard!
The Grand below Belwood to Fergus for catch & release browns. Hot temps kill Brookies..you got to respect the resource.
Forks of the Credit area can be good...as much for the scenery as for the fish...strictly c&r, no organic baits, barbless.  Worth a try though....the scenery is speck-tacular
